languages.text: "Лорд-капитан?"{n}Голос Мастера вокса, обычно спокойный и сдержанный, предательски подрагивает, пробиваясь сквозь легкий шум статики.{/n} "Я видела сообщения о перестрелке в отсеке. Что произошло? Вам удалось навести порядок? И в каком состоянии Идира?"

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан?"{n}Голос Мастера Вокса, обычно спокойный и сдержанный, предательски подрагивает, пробиваясь сквозь легкий шум статики.{/n} "Я видела сообщения о перестрелке в отсеке. Что произошло? Вам удалось навести порядок? И в каком состоянии Идира?"

languages.text: "Lord Captain?" {n}The Vox Master's voice, usually calm and reserved, shakes traitorously, fighting through the low-level static.{/n} "I saw a message about shooting in the bay. What happened? Did you manage to restore order? And what condition is Idira in?"
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан?"{n}Голос Мастера вокса, обычно спокойный и сдержанный, предательски подрагивает, пробиваясь сквозь легкий шум статики.{/n} "Я видела сообщения о перестрелке в отсеке. Что произошло? Вам удалось навести порядок? И в каком состоянии Идира?"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain?" {n}The Vox Master's voice, usually calm and reserved, shakes traitorously, fighting through the low-level static.{/n} "I saw a message about shooting in the bay. What happened? Did you manage to restore order? And what condition is Idira in?"

"Lord Captain?" {n}The Vox Master's voice, usually calm and reserved, shakes traitorously, fighting through the low-level static.{/n} "I saw a message about shooting in the bay. What happened? Did you manage to restore order? And what condition is Idira in?"

"Lord Captain?" {n}The Vox Master's voice, usually calm and reserved, shakes traitorously, fighting through the low-level static.{/n} "I saw a message about shooting in the bay. What happened? Did you manage to restore order? And what condition is Idira in?"

"Lord Captain?" {n}The Vox Master's voice, usually calm and reserved, shakes traitorously, fighting through the low-level static.{/n} "I saw a message about shooting in the bay. What happened? Did you manage to restore order? And what condition is Idira in?"

languages.text: “舰长大人？”{n}音阵大师原本平静而矜持的声音，此刻不同寻常地颤抖着，声音中充满了静电的嗡嗡声。{/n}“我收到了报告，说甲板发生了枪击事件。您已经恢复秩序了吗？还有，伊迪拉目前是什么情况？”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain?" {n}The Vox Master's voice, usually calm and reserved, shakes traitorously, fighting through the low-level static.{/n} "I saw a message about shooting in the bay. What happened? Did you manage to restore order? And what condition is Idira in?"

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人？”{n}音阵大师原本平静而矜持的声音，此刻不同寻常地颤抖着，声音中充满了静电的嗡嗡声。{/n}“我收到了报告，说甲板发生了枪击事件。您已经恢复秩序了吗？还有，伊迪拉目前是什么情况？”

languages.text: «¿Lord Capitán?». {n}La voz de la maestra de vocos, normalmente tranquila y reservada, tiembla, revelando su preocupación a través de la estática.{/n} «He visto un mensaje que habla de disparos en la bahía. ¿Qué ha ocurrido? ¿Ha logrado restaurar el orden? ¿En qué estado se encuentra Idira?».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain?" {n}The Vox Master's voice, usually calm and reserved, shakes traitorously, fighting through the low-level static.{/n} "I saw a message about shooting in the bay. What happened? Did you manage to restore order? And what condition is Idira in?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Lord Capitán?». {n}La voz de la maestra de vocos, normalmente tranquila y reservada, tiembla, revelando su preocupación a través de la estática.{/n} «He visto un mensaje que habla de disparos en la bahía. ¿Qué ha ocurrido? ¿Ha logrado restaurar el orden? ¿En qué estado se encuentra Idira?».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン？」{n}普段は冷静で控えめなヴォクス・マスターの声が、静寂の中で不実にも震えていた。{/n}「ベイで銃撃があったとの報告を確認しました。何があったのです？秩序は取り戻せたでしょうか？イディラの状態は？」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain?" {n}The Vox Master's voice, usually calm and reserved, shakes traitorously, fighting through the low-level static.{/n} "I saw a message about shooting in the bay. What happened? Did you manage to restore order? And what condition is Idira in?"

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン？」{n}普段は冷静で控えめなヴォクス・マスターの声が、静寂の中で不実にも震えていた。{/n}「ベイで銃撃があったとの報告を確認しました。何があったのです？秩序は取り戻せたでしょうか？イディラの状態は？」

languages.text: "Lord Captain?" {n}Die ansonsten so ruhige und reservierte Stimme der Voxmeisterin zittert verräterisch, während sie gegen das Rauschen ankämpft.{/n} "Ich habe eine Nachricht über Schüsse in der Bucht gehört. Was ist passiert? Konntet Ihr die Ordnung wiederherstellen? Und in welchem Zustand ist Idira?"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain?" {n}The Vox Master's voice, usually calm and reserved, shakes traitorously, fighting through the low-level static.{/n} "I saw a message about shooting in the bay. What happened? Did you manage to restore order? And what condition is Idira in?"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain?" {n}Die ansonsten so ruhige und reservierte Stimme der Voxmeisterin zittert verräterisch, während sie gegen das Rauschen ankämpft.{/n} "Ich habe eine Nachricht über Schüsse in der Bucht gehört. Was ist passiert? Konntet Ihr die Ordnung wiederherstellen? Und in welchem Zustand ist Idira?"

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ? » {n}La voix de la maîtresse-vox, ordinairement calme et réservée, tremble traîtreusement à travers le faible grésillement des interférences.{/n} « J'ai vu un message signalant une fusillade à la baie. Que s'est-il passé ? Avez-vous réussi à rétablir l'ordre ? Et Idira, comment se porte-t-elle ? »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain?" {n}The Vox Master's voice, usually calm and reserved, shakes traitorously, fighting through the low-level static.{/n} "I saw a message about shooting in the bay. What happened? Did you manage to restore order? And what condition is Idira in?"

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ? » {n}La voix de la maîtresse-vox, ordinairement calme et réservée, tremble traîtreusement à travers le faible grésillement des interférences.{/n} « J'ai vu un message signalant une fusillade à la baie. Que s'est-il passé ? Avez-vous réussi à rétablir l'ordre ? Et Idira, comment se porte-t-elle ? »

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan?" {n}Voks Üstadı'nın genelde sakin ve mesafeli olan ses tonu, düşük seviyeli parazitlerin arasından haince titreyerek çıkıyor.{/n} "Bölmede çatışma çıktığına dair bir mesaj gördüm. Ne oldu? Düzen yeniden tesis edildi mi? İdira ne durumda?"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain?" {n}The Vox Master's voice, usually calm and reserved, shakes traitorously, fighting through the low-level static.{/n} "I saw a message about shooting in the bay. What happened? Did you manage to restore order? And what condition is Idira in?"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan?" {n}Voks Üstadı'nın genelde sakin ve mesafeli olan ses tonu, düşük seviyeli parazitlerin arasından haince titreyerek çıkıyor.{/n} "Bölmede çatışma çıktığına dair bir mesaj gördüm. Ne oldu? Düzen yeniden tesis edildi mi? İdira ne durumda?"
